mapper.select: SELECT c.aaa101 AS 'replierId', c.aaa102 AS 'replierName', c.aaa106 AS 'replierPic', a.aad002 AS 'content', DATE_FORMAT(a.aad003,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS 'time', a.aad004 AS 'respondedId', b.aaa102 AS 'respondedName' FROM ad00 a, aa01 b, aa01 c WHERE a.aaa101=c.aaa101 AND a.aad004=b.aaa101 AND a.aac001=#{pid} ORDER BY time ;
